author: Anonymous Gear
title: Termination Arguments
question:
If Genrec is included in the template and being used in a function, are we always obligated to write a termination argument?
I see that it is necessary for strictly genrec problems (ex. fractals), but if a graphs or search problem uses genrec, will we be deducted marks if we do not include the termination argument?
Or as a general rule of thumb we should always include it?
student_answer: You need to include a termination argument whenever using genrec.
